Text: This is not the entire first season, it's just the first 5 episodes.

Great quality, small file size.

10 episodes

Really enjoyed this, can't wait for next season. So many loose ends. Dragon girl, the war, the ominous winter, the king you love to hate. This show really keeps you hanging.
